data.name: Concordia: Digital Edition - Corsica & Gallia
data.detailed_description:
This expansion contains two additional maps - Corsica and Gallia, that add variety and new challenges to the game:

  • üèùÔ∏è Corsica is a small 20 City, 8 Province map where Prefects provide bonus gold.
  • üó∫Ô∏è Gallia is a 25 City, 10 Province map where players face the challenges of crossing the English Channel and navigating the river Sienne and securing Harbors to sail past the Mediterranean Sea!

Take to the seas and face new challenges in your Concordia games today!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1707533/Concordia_Digital_Edition__Corsica__Gallia/
data.about_the_game:
This expansion contains two additional maps - Corsica and Gallia, that add variety and new challenges to the game:

  • üèùÔ∏è Corsica is a small 20 City, 8 Province map where Prefects provide bonus gold.
  • üó∫Ô∏è Gallia is a 25 City, 10 Province map where players face the challenges of crossing the English Channel and navigating the river Sienne and securing Harbors to sail past the Mediterranean Sea!

data.short_description: An official DLC to Concordia: Digital Edition adding two new maps - Gallia and Corsica with their unique mechanics - all of which will add variety and new challenges to your games!
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Italian, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 450 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
